div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Provider Registry

title.value: BC Provider Location Registry FHIR Implementation Guide

description.value: FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Provider Registry

name.value: BC Facility Community Health Service Area Extension

description.value: A code that represents the Community Health Service Area (CHSA) that the location is a part of.
Provides the details of a facility as represented by a FHIR location.

name.value: BC Facility Health Authority Area Extension

description.value: A code that represents the health authority area that the location is a part of.

name.value: BC Facility Health Service Area Extension

description.value: A wrapper extension that will allow to list all the health service area, including the PCN and the Community Health Service Area.

name.value: BC Facility Health Service Delivery Area Extension

description.value: A code that represents the Health Service Delivery Area (HSDA) that the location is a part of.

name.value: BC Facility Local Health Area Extension

description.value: A code that represents the Local Health Area (LHA) that the location is a part of.
An optional physical address for the facility.

name.value: BC Facility Primary Care Network Extension

description.value: A code that represents the Primary Care Network (PCN) that the location is a part of.

name.value: BC Health Delivery Site sub-type Extension

description.value: Uses to define HDS sub type

name.value: BC Health Delivery Site Type Extension

description.value: Uses to define HDS Type and HDS sub type

name.value: BC Health Delivery Site Type Value Set

description.value: BC ealth Delivery Site Type Value set.
BC Language value set.

name.value: BC License Status Class Value Set

description.value: BC specific license status class value set.
Tracking the status and changes to the status of a practitioner/organization license.

name.value: BC License Status Reason Value Set

description.value: BC specific license status reason value set.
BC specific license status value set.
Allows for use on a simple name string.
Notes about the practitioner/location/organization.

name.value: BC Organization Role Code Value Set

description.value: BC Organization Role Codes.
Tracking the owner.

This capability statement describes the use case that is supported by the BC FHIR implementation of PLR.
* Distributions - used when PLR is communicating a change in a single Practitioner, Organization, or Location

This capability statement is listing the RESTful resources that are exposed as well as the three use cases that are supported by the BC FHIR implementation of PLR (see json or XML for more details): * Maintain - used when an external source is communicating a change to PLR * Batch - allows for the sending of multiple Maintain transactions at one time (not implemented yet) * Queries - a set of operations are defined that allow the querying of PLR FHIR instances (entityQuery and extendedQuery)
All POST and PUT Requests are sent using a Paramaters resource and the Response is always a Bundle resource containing an OperationOutcome and the expected profile(s) (BCPractitioner, BCPractitionerBundle ect ...)
Conditions on the provider's role

name.value: BC Practitioner Date of Death Extension

description.value: The Date of Death of a Practitioner.
Provides details of disciplinary actions against the provider.

description.value: Allows for relationships of practitioners to practitioners without needing CareTeam semantics.

name.value: Extension for BC Organization to add Primary Care Clinic details

description.value: A wrapper extension that will allow to add the Primary Care Clinic details.

name.value: Extension for the clinic business legal name.

description.value: The clinic business lagal name

name.value: Extension to indicate if the clinic is part of the Primary Care Initiative.

description.value: Flag that indicates if (Primary Care) Clinic is part of the PrimaryCare Initiative. not all PC clinic are part of this initiative

name.value: Extension to represent Availability, or hours of operation, for clinic, or other Profiles

description.value: Can represent the Available time or the Not-Available details
The (Primary Care) Clinic Owner - still pending some detailed requirements

name.value: Extension to represent the available Time, or hours of operation, for clinic, or other Profiles

description.value: Can represent the Available time

name.value: Extension to represent the Clinic Ownership type.

description.value: The (Primary Care) Clinic Ownership type, the expected value is one from Health Authority Owned/Operated, First Nation Health Authority Owned/Operated, Physician Owned/Operated, Non-Profit Society, Non-Physician Corporation, Other

name.value: Extension to represent the Clinic Payee number.

description.value: The (Primary Care) Clinic Payee number

name.value: Extension to represent the Clinic Service Delivery type.

description.value: The (Primary Care) Clinic Service Delivery type, the expected value is one from Longitudinal, Episodic, and Mixed

name.value: Extension to represent the Clinic type.

description.value: The (Primary Care) Clinic type, the expected value is one from UPCC, FNPCI, NPCC, CHC, Walk-In/Episodic Care Clinic, Family Practice, Longitudinal Primary Care Practice, Hybrid Primary Care Practice

name.value: Extension to represent the details when an item is NOT available for clinic, or other Profiles

description.value: Can represent the Not Avaialble details
This operation is used to create and update the resources that represent a Provider or Facility.

name.value: PLR entities sent out in a distribution.

description.value: This operation is used to distribute the resources that represent a Provider or Facility.

name.value: Query for a location that returns associated resources

description.value: This operation is used to query for an location and will return the information for that location along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other providers, organizations, or location.

name.value: Query for a location without returning associations

description.value: This operation is used to query for an location and will return the information for that location without following associations to other practitioner, organizations, or locations.

name.value: Query for a Practitioner that returns associated resources

description.value: This operation is used to query for a provider and will return the information for that provider along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

name.value: Query for a practitioner without returning associations

description.value: This operation is used to query for a practitioner and will return the information for that practitioner without following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

name.value: Query for an organization that returns associated resources

description.value: This operation is used to query for an organization and will return the information for that organization along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other practitioners, organizations, or locations.

name.value: Query for an organization without returning associations

description.value: This operation is used to query for an organization and will return the information for that organization without following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

title.value: Transition from V3 Provider to FHIR
